snippet: Oracle has one great claim over Salesforce.com: The cloud computing upstart relies on Oracle databases. That may be starting to change, however. Salesforce just started hiring engineers for an open source database project that it says will grow...
abstract: Oracle has one great claim over Salesforce.com: The cloud computing upstart relies on Oracle databases. That may be starting to change, however. Salesforce just started hiring engineers for an open source database project that it says will grow significantly over the coming months.

headline.main: Salesforce Hires to Go Open Source
